headline: Chubb (CB) Strengthens Emerging Market Growth With Nubank Partnership, Citizens Maintains Market Outperform
summary: Chubb Limited (NYSE:CB) ranks among the best undervalued European stocks to buy now. On February 4, Citizens reiterated its Market Outperform rating for Chubb Limited (NYSE:CB) with a $350 price target. The firm noted Chubb’s considerable presence in global markets as a significant bonus, predicting stronger long-term growth than rivals due to the company’s position […]
